Title: Messiah, King, & Priest

Verses.1:
The LORD says to my master:
	"Sit at my right hand,
and I will make your enemies
	into a footstool for your feet."
Verses.2:
From Zion, the LORD will extend your mighty scepters reach, saying,
	"Rule in the midst of your enemies."
Verses.3:
On the day of your power, your people will follow you,
	in your holy splendor,
	"With the breaking of dawn, your youth comes to you like the dew."
Verses.4:
The LORD swore an irrevocable oath,
	"You are a priest always, in the order of King Melchizedek."
Verses.5:
On your right is my master,
	who will crush rulers on the day of his wrath.
Verses.6:
He will judge the nations, filling them with corpses,
	and crushing many rulers across the earth.
Verses.7:
He will drink from the brook along his way;
	therefore he will lift up his head.

Changes: 2023-09-30 - Paul Prins: Fixed casings on divine name.
2021-05-02 - Paul Prins: Removed Liturgical Formatting from the version in the breviary, also including verse 6 which is excluded from the breviary.
